Notes.Text:
This update for podman fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2025-6032: Fixed machine init command failing to verify TLS certificate (bsc#1245320)

Vulnerabilities.Description: A flaw was found in Podman. The podman machine init command fails to verify the TLS certificate when downloading the VM images from an OCI registry. This issue results in a Man In The Middle attack.
